title: Request Alumni Email Forwarding
description: An alumnus has forgotten their password for their lifetime alumni email forwarding address and needs it reset.

tasks.description: Identify the alumnus and verify their identity.
Explain that the alumni address is a forwarding service and does not have its own password.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clarifies how the service works.

tasks.description: Guide the alumnus on how to update their forwarding destination address in the alumni portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides instructions for the alumnus to manage their own settings.
